| expensive (adj) | cheap (adj) | antonym |
| car (n) | vehicle (n) | synonym |

| left (adv) | right (adv) | antonym |
| corner (n) | intersection (n) | synonym |
| full (adj) | empty (adj) | antonym |
| moon (n) | satellite (n) | synonym |
| bright (adj) | dim (adj) | antonym |
